titleStmt.title: Robin Hoods chase. Or, A merry progress between Robin Hood and King Henry Shewing how robin Hood led the King his chase, from London to London, and when he had spoken with the Queen, he returned to merry Sherewood. To the tune of, Robin Hood and the beggar.
titleStmt.author: Robins, Thomas, fl. 1672-1685.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for F. Coles, T. Vere, J. Wright, and J. Clarke,

notesStmt.note: Verse - "Come you gallants all, to you I do call".
Place of publication from Wing, which estimates 1674-1679 as publication date.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
